member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetAllProcessedArticles(System.String)
member.summary:
Serializes recent processed parent articles that match the specified filter
An article is said to be recent if the publish date is not older than: - Spam: 1 month - Disease information: 1 year - Disease activity: 1 year
member.param: string filter for articles that can either be all or unprocessed. Otherwise, the parent articles are obtained from spam articles.
member.returns: Serialized list of parent articles (ArticleGridWithSimilarCluster)

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetFilteredArticle(System.Web.Mvc.FormCollection)
member.summary:
Handles POST request for retrieving list of recent processed parent articles, filtered by the specified form. Possible filters include: - disease ID - geoname ID - article feed source - publish date - ham type (defaults to non-spam if unspecified) - article type: all, unprocessed, spam
An article is said to be recent if the publish date is not older than: - Spam: 1 month - Disease information: 1 year - Disease activity: 1 year
member.param: form for filtering articles to be returned
member.returns: HTTP response containing the list of parent articles

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetParentArticles(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Linq.IGrouping{System.Nullable{System.Decimal},Biod.Zebra.Library.EntityModels.Surveillance.SurveillanceProcessedArticle}})
member.summary: Creates a list of processed parent articles. For each valid cluster ID (positive non-null), the parent article is the article with the latest publish date. For each non-valid cluster ID (null or negative), each article is marked as a parent article.
member.param: list of processed articles grouped by cluster ID
member.returns: list of parent articles ordered by descending publish date

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetEventDataJson(System.String)
member.summary: Handles GET request for retrieving list of events filtered by the specified search term.
member.param: Event title to match search on. Returned events can be partial matches of the search term.
member.returns: HTTP response containing list of matching events

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetLocationDataJson(System.String)
member.summary: Handles GET request for retrieving list of locations filtered by the specified search term.
member.param: Geoname to match search on. Returned locations can be partial matches of the search term.
member.returns: HTTP response containing list of matching locations

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetDiseaseDataJson(System.String)
member.summary: Handles GET request for retrieving list of diseases filtered by the specified search term.
member.param: Disease name to match search on. Returned diseases can be partial matches of the search term.
member.returns: HTTP response containing list of matching diseases

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetArticlesForEventGroupedByLocation(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Groups processed articles for the specified event ID. Each group, uniquely identified by geoname ID, contains non-spam articles ordered by descending publish date.
member.param: event ID to base search on
member.returns: Serialized list of non-spam processed articles group by event location (EventArticlesCategorizedByLocations)

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetArticlesForSuggestedEventGroupedByLocation(System.String)
member.summary: Groups processed articles for the specified suggested event ID. Each group is uniquely identified by geoname ID.
member.param: suggested event ID to base search on
member.returns: Serialized list of processed articles group by event location (EventArticlesCategorizedByLocations)

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.GetDiseaseType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Handles GET request for retrieving disease type for the specified disease ID
member.returns: disease type string

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.SaveSuggestedEventOnDialogWindow(Biod.Surveillance.ViewModels.SuggestedEventModel)
member.summary: Handles POST request for converting a suggested event into a real event. This involves deleting the suggested event from the Suggested Event DB table and adding into the Event DB table. Synchronizer is also executed to notify Data Services of this change.
member.returns: event ID of the real event created, or -1 if creation failed

member.name: M:Biod.Surveillance.Controllers.HomeController.UpdateUserActiononSuggestedEvent(System.String,Biod.Surveillance.ViewModels.SuggestedEventUserAction)
member.summary: Asynchronous task for updating user action for the suggested event metadata into Mongo DB
member.param: event ID of the suggested event to be synced
int specifying the action performed (from EnumUserAction.UserActions)
